displaytitle: Two Church Towers, after drawing by Antonius van den Wyngaerde in the Bodelian Library
creditline: Gift of George L. Small, Class of 1943
inscribed:
in graphite, center left: St. Leonards | St. Marguerite | a little south of St. Dunstan
in graphite, lower right: St Andrew Hubbard | St. Batulfe in [illegible] | Botolph same | north west | of B- next before St | Dunstan in the East

titles.title: Album containing 99 original drawings and 87 architecture, portrait, and costume studies of a documentary nature for the paintings Latimer Preaching at Paul's Cross and The Martyrdom of Ridley and Latimer.
Two Church Towers, after drawing by Antonius van den Wyngaerde in the Bodelian Library

makers.displaymaker: Sir George Hayter, 1792–1871; born and died London, England
